remarks: If there is only a finite number of symbols, the number of words of a fixed length over these symbols is also finite.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Mar-2018.)
statement:
wrdnfi $p |- ( ( V e. Fin /\ N e. NN0 ) -> { w e. Word V | ( # ` w ) = N } e. Fin ) $.
$d N w $.
$d V w $.
